Author: Doctordoomduck
Text: If you’re craving salty, try drinking beef or chicken broth. If you’re craving sweet, try a fruity tea with artificial sweetener. I’ve drank nothing but blueberry tea for the last week.

Author: mentalcasethrowaway
Text: You know the first thing I'm going to do after the curse is lifted? Eat a whole bushel of apples. Arrrrr!
